doc:
Michael Gough https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Gough 0 Francis Michael Gough ( GOF; 23 November 1916 – 17 March 2011) was an English character actor who made over 150 film and television appearances, known for his roles in the Hammer Horror Films from 1958 and for his recurring role as Alfred Pennyworth in all four films of the Tim Burton / Joel Schumacher Batman quadrology. Francis_Michael_Gough ( GOF ; 23_November_1916 – 17_March_2011 ) was an_English_character_actor who made over_150_film_and_television_appearances , known for his_roles in the_Hammer_Horror_Films from 1958 and for his_recurring_role as Alfred_Pennyworth in all_four_films of the_Tim_Burton / Joel_Schumacher_Batman_quadrology .
